segments.text: Looking at this scene, the kitchen feels so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that sink is overflowing like crazy, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is just polishing that plate, ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is probably getting wet from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids on the left, up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced precariously on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in one hand and a plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is begging for one with her little hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're sharing the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water on the floor could make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the faucet turned off? This is frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, totally at peace.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before disaster strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR
